thread.title: NTT Facilities to Build 33MW Solar Plant in Miyazaki
thread.title_full: NTT Facilities to Build 33MW Solar Plant in Miyazaki

title: NTT Facilities to Build 33MW Solar Plant in Miyazaki
text:
NTT Facilities to Build 33MW Solar Plant in Miyazaki NTT Facilities to Build 33MW Solar Plant in Miyazaki 2015/10/05 14:12 Kenji Kaneko, Nikkei BP CleanTech Institute An image of the 32.697MW solar power plant (source: NTT Facilities) 
NTT Facilities Inc announced Sept 16, 2015, that it will build a solar power plant with an output of about 32.697MW on the site of a former golf course in Kunitomi-chou, Miyazaki Prefecture, Japan. 
The construction of the plant started Aug 20, 2015, and it is scheduled to be completed in January 2017. The total capacity of solar panels to be installed at the plant will be about 32.697MW, and the total rated output of PV inverters will be 29.7MW. 
The solar panel, PV inverter and mounting system employed for the plant are products of Suntech Power Japan Corp, Hitachi Ltd and NTT Facilities, respectively.
